data.name: ToolboxTabName
data.value: NetAdvantage 11.2 Silverlight

data.name: XamCalendarAssetLibrary
data.value: Infragistics

data.name: CalendarDay_IsWorkday_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the day is considered a work day as set in the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamCalendar.Workdays

data.name: CalendarItem_ComputedBackground_Property
data.value: Returns the brush to use for the background based on the element's state.

data.name: CalendarItem_ComputedBorderBrush_Property
data.value: Returns the brush to use for the BorderBrush based on the element's state

data.name: CalendarItem_ComputedForeground_Property
data.value: Returns the brush to use for the Foreground based on the element's state

data.name: CalendarItem_ComputedInnerBorderBrush_Property
data.value: Returns the brush to use for the InnerBorderBrush based on the element's state

data.name: CalendarItem_ContainsSelectedDates_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the date contains at least one selected date.

data.name: CalendarItem_ContainsToday_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the item contains the current date.

data.name: CalendarItem_EndDate_Property
data.value: Returns the ending date for the calendar item.

data.name: CalendarItem_IsActive_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the day represents the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.CalendarBase.ActiveDate

data.name: CalendarItem_IsHighlighted_Property
data.value: Returns true if this day should be highlighted (read-only).

data.name: CalendarItem_IsLeadingOrTrailingItem_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the CalendarItem is a leading or trailing date in the containing Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItemGroup

data.name: CalendarItem_IsSelected_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the date is selected.

data.name: CalendarItem_IsSelectionActive_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating indicating whether the containing CalendarBase has keyboard focus.

data.name: CalendarItem_IsToday_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the element is an item in the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamCalendar.MinCalendarMode and represents the current date.

data.name: CalendarItem_StartDate_Property
data.value: Returns the starting date for the calendar item.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_CurrentMode_Property
data.value: Returns the current calendar mode.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_FirstDateOfGroup_Property
data.value: Returns a System.Nullable`1 that represents the first item of the group. Note, this will not be the first item displayed within the group if the group displays leading dates.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_IsLeadingGroup_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating if the group is considering a leading group.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_IsTrailingGroup_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating if the group is considering a leading group.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_LastDateOfGroup_Property
data.value: Returns a System.Nullable`1 that represents the last date of the group. Note, this will not be the last date displayed within the group if the group displays trailing days.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_ReferenceGroupOffset_Property
data.value: Returns or sets an integer that is used to calculate the dates displayed within the group based on the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.CalendarBase.ReferenceDate of the containing Infragistics.Controls.Editors.CalendarBase.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_ShowLeadingDates_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether the group should display dates from the previous range of dates.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_ScrollNextButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the visibility of the button that scrolls its contents to display the next set of dates.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_ScrollPreviousButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the visibility of the button that scrolls its contents to display the previous set of dates.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_ShowTrailingDates_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether the group should display dates from the next range of dates.

data.name: CalendarItemGroup_Title_Property
data.value: Returns the title of the group (read-only).

data.name: CalendarDayOfWeek_DayOfWeek_Property
data.value: Returns an enumeration for this day of week (read-only).

data.name: CalendarDayOfWeek_DisplayText_Property
data.value: Returns the string to display for this day of week (read-only)

data.name: XamCalendar_DisabledDates_Property
data.value: Returns a modifiable collection of Infragistics.DateRange instances that indicates the items that should be considered disabled.

data.name: Calendar_Properties
data.value: Calendar Properties

data.name: XamCalendar_DisabledDaysOfWeek_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a flagged enumeration indicating which days of the week are always disabled.

data.name: XamCalendar_DisabledDaysOfWeekVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether days of the week disabled using the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamCalendar.DisabledDaysOfWeek should be displayed in the calendar.

data.name: XamCalendar_MaxDate_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the preferred maximum date that can be selected or activated for the control.

data.name: XamCalendar_MaxSelectedDates_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the maximum number of days that can be selected at any time.

data.name: XamCalendar_MinCalendarMode_Property
data.value: Returns or sets an enumeration that indicates the minimum calendar item type that can be selected within the control.

data.name: XamCalendar_MinDate_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the preferred minimum date that can be selected or activated for the control.

data.name: XamCalendar_FirstDayOfWeek_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the System.DayOfWeek that represents the first day of the week or null to use the value from the current System.Globalization.CultureInfo.

data.name: XamCalendar_SelectionMode_Property
data.value: Determines how many items can be selected.

data.name: XamCalendar_TodayButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean that indicates whether the today button should be displayed.

data.name: XamCalendar_WeekRule_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the rule used to determine the first week of the year.

data.name: XamCalendar_Workdays_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a flagged enumeration indicating which days of the week represent working days.

data.name: CalendarBase_ActiveDate_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the date of the active day.

data.name: CalendarBase_AllowLeadingAndTrailingGroupActivation_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean that indicates if items within a CalendarItemGroup whose IsLeadingGroup or IsTrailingGroup is true can be activated.

data.name: CalendarBase_AutoAdjustDimensions_Property
data.value: Returns or sets whether the control should automatically calculate and change the calendar dimensions based on the size used to arrange the CalendarBase.

data.name: CalendarBase_CalendarDayStyle_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the default style to use for Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarDay instances within the control.

data.name: CalendarBase_CalendarItemStyle_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the default style to use for Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItem instances within the control.

data.name: CalendarBase_CurrentMode_Property
data.value: Returns or sets which types of calendar items will be displayed to the end user.

data.name: CalendarBase_DayOfWeekHeaderFormat_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the format for the header of the days of the week.

data.name: CalendarBase_DayOfWeekHeaderVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the day of week headers should be displayed.

data.name: CalendarBase_Dimensions_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating the preferred rows and columns of groups to be displayed within the control.

data.name: CalendarBase_IsSelectionActive_Property
data.value: Returns true if keyboard focus is within the control (read-only)

data.name: CalendarBase_LeadingAndTrailingDatesVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether to show days from the month before/after the first/last visible month.

data.name: CalendarBase_MaxDateResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the maximum allowed date (read-only)

data.name: CalendarBase_MinCalendarModeResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the minimum Infragistics.Controls.Editors.CalendarZoomMode that is supported

data.name: CalendarBase_MinDateResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the minimum allowed date (read-only)

data.name: CalendarBase_ReferenceDate_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a date that is used to determine the dates that should be displayed within the control.

data.name: CalendarBase_ResourceProvider_Property
data.value: Returns or sets an object that provides resources for use by elements in the visual tree.

data.name: CalendarBase_ResourceProviderResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resource provider to use.

data.name: CalendarBase_ScrollButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the visibility of the scroll buttons with the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItemGroup instances.

data.name: CalendarBase_ScrollNextRepeatButtonStyle_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the style for the 'ScrollNext' RepeatButton.

data.name: CalendarBase_ScrollNextRepeatButtonStyleResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the style to use for the 'ScrollNext' RepeatButton (read-only)

data.name: CalendarBase_ScrollPreviousRepeatButtonStyle_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the style for the 'ScrollPrevious' RepeatButton.

data.name: CalendarBase_ScrollPreviousRepeatButtonStyleResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the style to use for the 'ScrollPrevious' RepeatButton (read-only)

data.name: CalendarBase_SelectedDate_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the date of the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItem that should be selected or null if no item is selected.

data.name: CalendarBase_SelectedDates_Property
data.value: Returns a collection of System.DateTime instances that represents the currently selected dates of the items in the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamCalendar.MinCalendarMode.

data.name: CalendarBase_TodayButtonCaption_Property
data.value: Returns the caption to use for the 'Today' Button (read-only)

data.name: CalendarBase_TodayButtonStyle_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the style for the 'Today' Button.

data.name: CalendarBase_TodayButtonStyleResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the style to use for the 'Today' Button (read-only)

data.name: CalendarBase_WeekNumberVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean that indicates whether week numbers should be displayed.

data.name: CalendarBase_Today_Property
data.value: Returns a DateTime that represents today's date.

data.name: CalendarCommandSource_CommandType_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the CalendarCommand which is to be executed by the command.

data.name: Resources_Customizer_Property
data.value: Returns the Infragistics.Shared.ResourceCustomizer for this assembly.

data.name: CalendarWeekNumber_ComputedBackground_Property
data.value: Returns the brush to use for the background based on the element's state.

data.name: CalendarWeekNumber_IsSelected_Property
data.value: Returns whether all the days in the week are selected (read-only)

data.name: CalendarItemArea_ComputedItemsBorderThickness_Property
data.value: Returns the border thickness around the items (read-only).

data.name: CalendarItemArea_DayOfWeekHeaderVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns a value indicating the visibility of the day of week headers (read-only).

data.name: CalendarItemArea_Items_Property
data.value: Returns a collection of Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItem instances that are displayed within the group.

data.name: CalendarItemArea_FirstItemColumnOffset_Property
data.value: Returns an integer that represents the number of items between the first date in the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItemArea.Items collection and the first column.

data.name: CalendarItemArea_FirstItemRowOffset_Property
data.value: Returns an integer that represents the number of items between the first date in the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItemArea.Items collection and the first row.

data.name: CalendarItemArea_ItemColumns_Property
data.value: Returns the number of columns that should be displayed in the group.

data.name: CalendarItemArea_ItemRows_Property
data.value: Returns the number of item rows that should be displayed in the group.

data.name: CalendarItemArea_WeekNumberVisibility_Property
data.value: Returns a value indicating whether week numbers should be displayed (read-only).

data.name: CalendarResourceProvider_ResourceSet_Property
data.value: Returns or sets an enumeration that determines which resource set to use.

data.name: SelectedDatesChangedEventArgs_RemovedDates_Property
data.value: Returns a list of the dates that were unselected.

data.name: SelectedDatesChangedEventArgs_AddedDates_Property
data.value: Returns a list of the dates that were selected.

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_AutoAdjustDimensions_Property
data.value: For internal use

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_Dimensions_Property
data.value: For internal use

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_HorizontalContentAlignment_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the alignment of the items within the element.

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_GroupHeight_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the height of the CalendarItemGroups within the panel.

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_GroupWidth_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the width of the CalendarItemGroups within the panel.

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_LeadingAndTrailingDatesVisibility_Property
data.value: For internal use

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_MaxGroups_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the maximum number of groups that the element may generate.

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_ScrollButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: For internal use

data.name: CalendarItemGroupPanel_VerticalContentAlignment_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the vertical alignment of the items within the element.

data.name: CalendarItemGroupTitle_ComputedBackground_Property
data.value: Returns the brush to use for the background based on the element's state.

data.name: CalendarItemGroupTitle_ComputedForeground_Property
data.value: Returns the brush to use for the Foreground based on the element's state

data.name: CalendarItemGroupTitle_Group_Property
data.value: Returns the associated Infragistics.Controls.Editors.Primitives.CalendarItemGroup (read-only)
